text: @CSIS #Ukraine #Russia #War #InternationalSecurity #SethGJones #EliotACohen #EmilyHarding #MichaelVickers #US #WesternAid 🇺🇦🇷🇺💪🏽🤝Two years since Russia's invasion of Ukraine 😱, and the war rages on 🔥. Join us for a virtual discussion with top experts 🧐 as we analyze the state of the war today 📊, strategies moving forward 💡, and the future of U.S. and Western aid to Ukraine 💰🇺🇸🌎 Let's stand with Ukraine 🤝🏽
